jcr:content.jcr:title: UGC Content Management
jcr:content.browserTitle: Social media content management | Adobe Experience Manager Livefyre
jcr:content.metaDescription: Adobe Experience Manager Livefyre helps you find, store, organize, and tag social media content to build a valuable repository of user-generated assets.
jcr:content.tagsKeywords: social media content, social media content management

text_6630.text: Adobe Experience Manager Livefyre helps you find, store, organize, and tag user-generated content, transforming it into a kaleidoscope of authentic assets you can use time and again.

text_f804.text: Search for the best content from all the top social networks.

text_2767.text: Organize and easily share your content among teams.

text_525b.text: Filter to find exactly what you’re looking for.

text_f1eb.text: Share brand and user-created assets now and later.

text_dbea.text: Seek out the content that fits your brand from Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, or any other site. Then narrow down the results by filtering for language, location, and more.

text_b4a9.text:
Collect just what you need.

Find the kind of content you want thanks to granular rules. Automatically stream it into your app or store it in your library folder for future use.
 
 

Audience Manager for advertisers.

Advertisers can grow their revenue and customer base through unified, actionable views of their audiences. Combine attributes from all of your data sources into high-value audience segments for ad targeting.

text_db9f.text:
Optimize while you organize.

Customizable folders provide a drag-and-drop spot to store all your favorite social moments.

Audience Manager for advertisers.

Advertisers can grow their revenue and customer base through unified, actionable views of their audiences. Combine attributes from all of your data sources into high-value audience segments for ad targeting.

text_83b5.text:
Make your content better and better.

Improve user-generated content with customized meta tags and ratings that help you find the perfect experience for the perfect moment.
 
 

Audience Manager for advertisers.

Advertisers can grow their revenue and customer base through unified, actionable views of their audiences. Combine attributes from all of your data sources into high-value audience segments for ad targeting.

image_1008.alt: Make your content better and better

text_3b43.text: Put content and likes on tap.

text_9fbe.text:
Tourism Australia used Livefyre to make its website truly social — resulting in a 77-percent lead increase.
Learn more ›

text_f9c5.text: "Livefyre helps us bring the best of our social features into our owned channels. [It also] created greater efficiencies in organizing content, storing our assets, and rights management—it’s definitely helped take us to the next level."

text_46ac.text: — John Mackenney, General Manager of Digital Transformation, Tourism Australia

text_34bc.text:
Experience Manager Livefyre overview
